name: The National Museum of Malaysia
description: The museum is situated in close proximity to the Perdana Lake Gardens and it provides an overview of Malaysian history and culture.
location: Jalan Damansara, in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia

name: The History and Ethnography Museum
description: The historical section of the museum displays the history of Malacca from its establishment in 1400 until 1957, the year Malaya gained independence.

name: Kota Tinggi Museum
description: The museum was constructed in 1997 and opened in 2002.

name: Kota Johor Lama Museum
description: The site where the museum stands today was first excavated in 1960 by the British.
location: Johor Lama, Kota Tinggi District, Johor, Malaysia

name: Pineapple Museum
description: The was inaugurated by Johor Chief Minister Abdul Ghani Othman on 21 May 2002.
location: Pekan Nanas, Pontian District, Johor, Malaysia

name: Army Museum Port Dickson
description: Established solely to feature the military influences and achievements of the country.
location: Pekan Nanas, Pontian District, Johor, Malaysia

name: Agong's Gallery
description: The official residence of the Malaysian King and showcases the history and heritage of the Malaysian monarchy.
